verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG2: to Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: early Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: after returning to the U.S. from a historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore] .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] took to Twitter early Wednesday after [V: returning] [ARG4: to the U.S.] [ARG3: from a historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore] .
